title: One Pot Sausage Pasta (Perfect Weeknight Dinner)
directions: Combine spaghetti, sausage, onion, basil, garlic, and 4.5 cups water in a large pot.
Bring the pot to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer uncovered until the water is gone and pasta is tender (about eight to ten minutes).
ingredients: 1 package of sausage, sliced into pieces
1 onion (diced with food processor or sliced thinly)
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
